title: Fragment, "Scenes from the War of Greek Independence", 1825–30
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave.
description: Five scenes, captioned in French, from the War of Greek Independence (1821-1829). Condition very poor. In purple on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, "Scenes from the War of Greek Independence", 1825–30.
1825–30. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-195.
